thread.title: Bush’s Painful Defense of Benghazi Investigation
thread.title_full: Bush’s Painful Defense of Benghazi Investigation

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Bush’s Painful Defense of Benghazi Investigation
text:
Bush’s Painful Defense of Benghazi Investigation October 18, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Jake Tapper asked Jeb Bush about Donald Trump’s assertion that his bother was at least partially responsible for the 9/11 terrorist attacks. 
The question: “If your brother and his administration bear no responsibility at all, how do you then make the jump that President Obama and Secretary Clinton are responsible for what happened at Benghazi?” 
Ezra Klein : “Bush’s response is almost physically painful to watch. The exchange begins at about 2:20.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
